cast.overview: Set in the Mayan civilization, when a man's idyllic presence is brutally disrupted by a violent invading force, he is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression where a harrowing end awaits him. Through a twist of fate and spurred by the power of his love for his woman and his family he will make a desperate break to return home and to ultimately save his way of life.
cast.title: Apocalypto

details.biography: Jonathan Brewer is known for Apocalypto (2006), Hyde Park on Hudson (2012) and DreamKeeper (2003).
details.name: Jonathan Brewer
